activities: Provides Global or International Outsourced Payroll Services which involves receiving Personal Information (but excludes the requirement for any health information).  Receipt of data sufficient to process in-country payroll; secure movement to / from country by SFTP; Consolidation of global results into central system in EU for access by the company who contracted for the global payroll service
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Payroll data supplied by client and sufficient to process and pay employees in countries contracted by client to SGWI.  This includes Personally Identifiable Information such as Dates of Birth, Social Security numbers.  In some countries information about Religion and or race may be required but this is limited to a few countries such as South Africa and Germany.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
